column4: hi folks. I'm a long time linux user, but first time playing with ubuntu. when you boot into the live environment, do you pick packages first then do install to install them? or how does picking packages work?
then you install more/deinstall packages after install?
if you want to choose to build-up instead of strip down, get the alternate CD, and install a "server" install on there (just a minimal installation sans GUI), then add stuff
